net.rptools.maptool.model.Token.gmNotes:
SR5 v02 --- * Recoil tracking (see Ammo, My Char, and Rest macros) * Added GM button to reduce all inits by -10. It does not remove players below 0, since the rules allow them free actions. * Added Lindsay's Whisper and Token Move-To macros to framework. I decided not to add Handout macros since they seem so janky. * "TokenNote" property added to tokens along with a macro adjust it. Anything you think the framework lacks can go right here. * Gave up on dialog auto-resizing. Now each frame is resizable, remembers its last location/dimensions, and can be docked. * When a GM does not select a token and tries to roll dice, the output is always secret. Chat now announces the GM is rolling secret dice, and the dialog makes this clear. * Re-uploaded macro button icons to imgur, since rptools gallery went down. If imgur goes down, the internet will go with it. * Fixed default player tokens ownership issues * Some much needed template token changes (thanks, SR Returns!)
SR5 v01 --- * SR5 style initiative (but no button yet to reduce everyone's init by 10). * SR5 ammo modes * Dialog/frame window sizes fixed (I hope?) * Stun damage overflow fix * Some error messages cleaned up
v18 ---- - fixed: players can only roll dice on tokens they own - fixed: dice mods can now accept equations ("+3-2") - fixed: dice can be rolled without selecting a token, cleaned up dialog - fixed: resized quick roll dialog box to better fit my laptop screen height - changed: moved Ammo reloading from Rest macro to Ammo macro - changed: hid the Shotgun / Ammo state modes until I can get some images for them - added: tooltips to the campaign macros - added: new Ammo modes for Arsenal weapons (high-velocity, minigun) - added: new states for Unwired programs (Corrupt, Disarm, Purge, Nuke, X, Y, Z)
v16 ---- - fixed: using tokens on other maps (doh!)
v15 ---- - fixed: initiative wound modifiers, broken tokens
v14 ---- - added: alt attributes to images, in case they don't load - added: states (many placeholders though) - added: basic lights/vision for circular, narrow cone, and wide cone - added: basic environmental colored lighting (partial light, thermal smoke, glare) - added: small default map to display VBL and lights interacting - added: grunt, lieutenant, and prime runner template tokens - added: state button and dialog for applying states/lights - CSS-ified the dialogs - changed: bar colors & positions - changed: condition monitor bars no longer appear if you're at 100% health - changed: when using the rule of six, 6's are now brighter green - fix: non-standard dice/thresholds are properly colored - added: high pain tolerance to My Char - added: gremlins (reduce # of 1s needed for a glitch) - added: min glitch # (set the minimum die roll needed to count toward glitches, such as 2 on a rushed extended test) - added: new ROLL MODE button that sets the output mode of all rolls (to self, to all, to GM, to GM & self), though it won't work on initiative rolls. - added: wound mods can be automatically added to rolls (currently: None, Phys & Stun, and Phys & Stun & Matrix)

net.rptools.CaseInsensitiveHashMap_-KeyV.value: To everyone, To self only, To GM and self, To GM only

Increases DV by +5.", "Simple action, once per phase. First long burst -5 recoil, second -6 recoil. Decreases defender's dice pool by -5.", "Complex action. -9 recoil. net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!-- Veggiesama's rollDice macro, MapTool B68 --> <!-- Takes a dicePoolObject and adds results to it -->
<!-- Initialize variables --> [H: dicePoolObject = macro.args] [H: unpackDicePoolObject(dicePoolObject)] [H: unloadLibProps()]
<!-- Roll the dice into a JSON array --> [H: diceArray = "[]"] [H: dicePool = if(dicePool<0, 0, dicePool)] [H, COUNT(dicePool): diceArray = json.append(diceArray, eval("1d" + SR4_DIE_SIDES))]
<!-- temporary override of minimum glitch # --> [H: MINIMUM_TO_GLITCH = max(MINIMUM_TO_GLITCH, minGlitch)]
<!-- Tally up the results --> [H: ones = 0] [H: hits = 0] [H: sixes = 0] [H, FOREACH(roll, diceArray), CODE: { [H: ones = if(roll <= MINIMUM_TO_GLITCH, ones + 1, ones)] [H: hits = if(roll >= THRESHOLD_HIT, hits + 1, hits)] [H: sixes = if(roll >= THRESHOLD_REROLL, sixes + 1, sixes)] }]
<!-- Tally up edge results --> [H: explodedSixes = 0] [H: sixesLeft = if(useEdge, sixes, 0)] [H, WHILE(sixesLeft > 0), CODE: { [H: tempDiceArray = "[]"] [H, COUNT(sixesLeft): tempDiceArray = json.append(tempDiceArray, eval("1d" + SR4_DIE_SIDES))] [H, FOREACH(roll, tempDiceArray), CODE: { [H: ones = if(roll <= MINIMUM_TO_GLITCH, ones + 1, ones)] [H: hits = if(roll >= THRESHOLD_HIT, hits + 1, hits)] [H: sixes = if(roll >= THRESHOLD_REROLL, sixes + 1, sixes)] }] [H: diceArray = json.merge(diceArray, tempDiceArray)] [H: explodedSixes = explodedSixes + sixesLeft] [H: sixesLeft = sixes - explodedSixes] }]
<!-- Glitch logic --> [H: glitchThreshold = round( json.length(diceArray) / 2 ) - gremlins] [H: isGlitch = if(ones >= glitchThreshold, 1, 0)] [H: isCritGlitch = if(isGlitch && hits == 0, 1, 0)]
<!-- Bundle up everything we've done --> [H: dicePoolObject = "{}"] [H: dicePoolObject = json.set(dicePoolObject, "DiceArray", diceArray, "Hits", hits, "Ones", ones, "Sixes", sixes, "IsGlitch", isGlitch, "IsCritGlitch", isCritGlitch )]
[H: macro.return = dicePoolObject]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: rollDice

<!-- Initialize variables --> [H: unloadLibProps()]
<!-- (bug workaround) --> [H: isPC = isPC()] [H: isNPC = isNPC()]
[H, FOR(i, 0, listCount(BAR_LIST)), CODE: { [H: barName = listGet(BAR_LIST, roll.count)] [H: npcShow = eval( listGet(SHOW_NPC_VAR_LIST, roll.count))] [H: currentValue = eval( "Current" + barName)] [H: maxValue = eval( "Max" + barName)] [H: use = eval( "Show" + barName + "Bar")] [H: changeBar = if(use && (isPC || (isNPC && npcShow)), 1, 0)] [H: invertBar = if(barName == "Physical" || barName == "Stun" || barName == "Matrix", 1, 0)]
[H: maxValue = if(maxValue==0, 1, maxValue)] <!-- divide by zero fix -->

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!-- Veggiesama's buildDicePoolObjectFromDialog macro, MapTool B68 -->
[H: checkClickedButton(macro.args)]
<!-- Pull the variables from the string prop --> [H: dicePoolObject = json.fromStrProp(macro.args)] [H: unpackDicePoolObject(dicePoolObject)] [H: unloadLibProps()]
<!-- Figure out the wound mod, if applicable --> [H, SWITCH(wounds): case "None": woundMod = 0; case "P&S": woundMod = getWoundMod(0); case "P&S&M": woundMod = getWoundMod(1) ]
<!-- Filling empty dialog entries with numbers --> [H, IF(!json.contains(dicePoolObject, "TokenIsSelected")): tokenIsSelected = 0] [H, IF(!json.contains(dicePoolObject, "SaveAsTokenMacro")): saveAsTokenMacro = 0] [H, IF(!json.contains(dicePoolObject, "UseEdge")): useEdge = 0] [H, IF(!json.contains(dicePoolObject, "DicePoolMod")): dicePoolMod = 0] [H, IF(!json.contains(dicePoolObject, "Gremlins")): gremlins = 0] [H, IF(!json.contains(dicePoolObject, "MinGlitch")): minGlitch = MINIMUM_TO_GLITCH] [H, IF(minGlitch == ""): minGlitch = MINIMUM_TO_GLITCH] [H, IF(gremlins == ""): gremlins = 0] [H, IF(dicePool == ""): dicePool = 0] [H, IF(dicePoolMod == ""): dicePoolMod = 0]
<!-- for some reason, the + gets chopped off when saved next to a number, so I am forcing an ASCII plus sign --> [H: plusSign = if(startsWith(dicePoolMod, "+") || startsWith(dicePoolMod, "-"), "", "+")] [H: woundModString = if(woundMod<0, woundMod, "")] [H: dicePoolModString = woundModString + if(dicePoolMod!=0 && dicePoolMod!="", plusSign + dicePoolMod, "")] [H: dicePoolString = dicePool] [H: dicePoolMod = eval(dicePoolMod+"")+woundMod] [H: dicePool = eval(dicePool+"") + dicePoolMod]
<!-- Fix the dicepool object --> [H: dicePoolObject = json.set(dicePoolObject, "UseEdge", useEdge, "DicePool", dicePool, "DicePoolMod", dicePoolMod, "DicePoolString", dicePoolString, "DicePoolModString", dicePoolModString, "Gremlins", gremlins, "MinGlitch", minGlitch )]
<!-- Memorize last inputs --> [IF(tokenIsSelected), CODE: { [H: Last = setStrProp(Last, "name", name)] [H: Last = setStrProp(Last, "dicePool", dicePoolString)] [H: Last = setStrProp(Last, "useEdge", useEdge)] [H: Last = setStrProp(Last, "gremlins", gremlins)] [H: Last = setStrProp(Last, "minGlitch", minGlitch)] [H: Last = setStrProp(Last, "wounds", wounds)] };{};]
<!-- Create a quick macro on the token --> [IF(saveAsTokenMacro && tokenIsSelected), CODE: { [MACRO("createQuickRoll@this"):dicePoolObject] };{};]
<!-- Remove extraneous keys --> [H: dicePoolObject = json.remove(dicePoolObject, "TokenIsSelected")] [H: dicePoolObject = json.remove(dicePoolObject, "SaveAsTokenMacro")] [H: dicePoolObject = json.remove(dicePoolObject, "Execute Quick Roll")]
<!-- Pass it on to be executed --> [MACRO("dice@this"):dicePoolObject]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: buildDicePoolObjectFromDialog

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!-- Veggiesama's setStates macro, MapTool B56 -->

[H: checkClickedButton(macro.args)]

[H: object = json.fromStrProp(macro.args)]
[H: object = json.remove(object, "Button")]

[H: clearLights()]
[H: setAllStates(0)]
[H: setWoundModState()]

[H, FOREACH(key, object), CODE: {

	<!-- Gridded states -->
	[H, IF(startsWith(key, "STATE_")), CODE: {
		[H: stateName = replace(key, "STATE_", "")]
		[H: setState(stateName, 1)]
	}]

	<!-- Mode states -->
	[H, IF(startsWith(key, "MODE_")), CODE: {
		[H: stateName = json.get(object, key)]
		[H, IF(stateName != "None"): setState(stateName, 1)]
	}]

	<!-- Lights -->
	[H, IF(startsWith(key, "LIGHT_")), CODE: {
		[H: lightGroup = replace(key, "LIGHT_", "")]
		[H: lightName = json.get(object, key)]
		[H, IF(lightName != "None"): setLight(lightGroup, lightName, 1)]
	}]

	<!-- Sight -->
	[H, IF(key == "SIGHT"), CODE: {
		[H: sightName = json.get(object, key)]
		[H, IF(sightName != "None"): setHasSight(1); setHasSight(0)]
		[H, IF(sightName != "None"): setSightType(sightName)]
	}]


}]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: setStates

net.rptools.maptool.model.Token.name: Lib:libLGMUtil
net.rptools.maptool.model.Token.label: r61 01
net.rptools.maptool.model.Token.gmNotes:
This token requires: a table (by default named "Handouts"). This token uses this property set but it is not required for your campaign configuration: LGMUtil    Handouts    Maps    MapsTemplate A set of Campaign Macros provide the functions. Player macros:
  • Handout -- Select PC token, press Handout, a dialog of available Handouts will be presented, then the selected handout will be shown.
  • Whisper -- This will pop up a Whisper frame that can be used to send whispers to multiple players.
GM macros:
  • Token Handout -- Select a token and run this macro, it will prompt with options of what to display to whom. It draws its display data from the selected token (token image, GM notes, etc.). This is a quickie handout tool and is unrelated to the Handout player macro.
  • MoveTokensToMap -- This will prompt for a destination, and move the selected tokens to include thier initiative values.
  • Config Move-To -- This is used to generate the list of destinations that the MoveTokensToMap macro uses.
  • Handout Access -- Used to grant a specific token view access to a specific handout
  • Config Handout -- Used to configure the header information and display options for the global handouts. The actual handout data is stored in a table that is by default named Handouts.
  • setStartMap -- Prompts for a map name and an X,Y coordinate (remember you can find those out since the mouse pointer coordinates are shown in the bottom info bar in MapTools). When a player connects, this will be the map and location that they are defaulted too.
A special token "TeleportPad" provides an alternate token movement mechanism. The GM runs the SummonPlayers macro on the TeleportPad token which will then send a link to chat. The players then select their token and click the link which will move their token to the map + x,y of the TeleportPad.

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [H: assert( isGM(), "" + getMacroName() + " is a GM only macro.", 0 )] [H: ids = getSelected()] [H: abort(if(ids == "", 0, 1))] [H: playerList = getAllPlayerNames()] [H: whichTokenTabString = ""] [H: whichTokenTabString = whichTokenTabString + "Text | Handout (click this) | Clickable text link || TEXT"] [H: whichTokenTabString = whichTokenTabString + " ## " + "dispElement|Image,Portrait,Handout,None|Show Which Image | RADIO"] [H: whichTokenTabString = whichTokenTabString + " ## " + "dispText | Notes, GM Notes, Free Text, NA(Token Name) | Show Which Text | RADIO"] [H: whichTokenTabString = whichTokenTabString + " ## " + "FreeText | On-the-fly info text |Enter free text | TEXT"] [H: SendToTabString = ""] [H: SendToTabString = SendToTabString + "dummy | 'All Players' overrides individual player choices | Display to | LABEL"] [H: SendToTabString = SendToTabString + " ## " + "allPlayersCheck | 1 | All Players | CHECK"] [H: SendToTabString = SendToTabString + " ## " + "dummy | ------------------------------------------------------- | --------------- | LABEL"] [H: playerNumber = 0] [H, FOREACH(tempPlayer, playerList), code: { [SendToTabString = SendToTabString + " ## " + "playercheck"+playerNumber+" | 0 | " + tempPlayer + " | CHECK"] [H: playerNumber = playerNumber+1] }] [H: success = input( "whichTokenTab | Info || TAB", whichTokenTabString, "sendToTab | SendTo || TAB", SendToTabString )] [H: abort(success)] [H: tToken = currentToken()] [H: displaytext = macroLink(Text,"subShowHandout@" + getMacroLocation(),"self","Element="+dispElement+"; Text = "+dispText+"; FreeText = "+FreeText, tToken)] [H: jarr = ""] [H: playerNumber = 0] [H, FOREACH(tempPlayer, playerList), code: { [tempTicked = eval("playercheck"+playerNumber)] [IF(tempTicked): jarr = json.append(jarr, tempPlayer)] [playerNumber = playerNumber+1] }] [IF(allPlayersCheck), code: { [R: displaytext] };{ [H: lgm.outputTo(jarr, displaytext)] [H: abort(0)] }]

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[H: cMap = getCurrentMapName() ] [H: destMap = json.get(macro.args, "map")] [H: tokenList = getSelected()] [H: numTList = listCount(tokenList)] [H: abort(numTList)] [H: dX = json.get(macro.args, "X") ] [H: dY = json.get(macro.args, "Y") ] [H: cntX = 1d3-2 ] [H: cntY = 1d3-2 ] [H: initJ = "[]" ] [H: output = "" ] [H: noInit = "The token is not in the initiative list." ] [FOREACH( tok, tokenList, "" ), CODE: { [H: tToken = tok ] [H: switchToken(tToken)] [H: newX = dX + cntX + 1 ] [H: newY = dY + cntY + 1 ] [H: cInit = noInit ] [H, IF( destMap != cMap ): cInit = getInitiative() ] [H, IF( destMap != cMap && cInit != noInit ): initJ = json.append( initJ, json.set( "{}", tToken, cInit ) ) ] [H, IF( destMap != cMap ): removeFromInitiative() ] [H, IF( destMap == cMap ): moveToken( newX, newY, 0, tToken ); moveTokenToMap( tToken, destMap, newX, newY ) ] [R: output = "" + getName(tToken) + " relocates to " + destMap + " (" + newX + "," + newY + ")
" ] [H: cntX = if( cntX == 1, -1, cntX+1 ) ] [H, IF( cntX == 0 ): cntY = if( cntY == 1, -1, cntY+1 ) ] }] [H, IF( cMap != destMap ): setCurrentMap( destMap ) ] [H: goto( dX, dY ) ] [H, FOREACH( pc, initJ ), CODE: { [ fN = json.fields( pc ) ] [TOKEN( fN ): addToInitiative( 0, json.get( pc, fN ) ) ] }]

[H: startMap = getCurrentMapName() ]
[H, IF( startMap != destMap ): setCurrentMap( destMap ) ] [H: goto( xC, yC ) ]

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!-- " dX = X destination coordinate dY = Y destination coordinate destMap = Destination map name string currentMap = Map where token is currently residing TokenID = Token ID init = Token initiative ( NONE = was not in the initiative panel on the starting map ) " --> [H: destMap = json.get(macro.args, "destMap")] [H: startMap = json.get(macro.args, "currentMap")] [H: xC = json.get(macro.args, "dX") ] [H: yC = json.get(macro.args, "dY") ] [H: cInit = json.get(macro.args, "init") ] [H: tToken = json.get(macro.args, "TokenID") ]
[H, IF( startMap != destMap ): setCurrentMap( startMap ) ] [H, IF( startMap != destMap ), TOKEN(tToken): removeFromInitiative()]
[R, IF( startMap == destMap ): moveToken( xC, yC, 0, tToken); moveTokenToMap( tToken, destMap, xC, yC )] [R, S, G, TOKEN(tToken), IF( startMap == destMap ): "Moved token " + getName() + " to coordinates X= " + xC + ", Y= " + yC ]
[H, IF( startMap != destMap ): setCurrentMap( destMap ) ] [H: goto( xC, yC ) ] [H, IF( startMap != destMap && cInit != "The token is not in the initiative list." ), TOKEN(tToken): addToInitiative( 0, cInit ) ]

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [H: assert( isGM(), "" + getMacroName() + " is a GM only macro.", 0 )] [H: gStartMap = getLibProperty("StartMap")] [H, IF( json.isEmpty( gStartMap ) ): gStartMap = json.set( json.set( json.set( "{}", "name", getCurrentMapName() ), "x", 0), "y", 0 ) ] [H: sMap = json.get( gStartMap, "name" ) ] [H: sX = json.get( gStartMap, "x" ) ] [H: sY = json.get( gStartMap, "y" ) ] [H: allMaps = getAllMapNames() ] [H: cancel = input( "sMap|" + allMaps + "|Select Map to start on|LIST|VALUE=STRING SELECT=" + listFind( allMaps, sMap), "sX|" + sX + "|Start Location (X)|TEXT|WIDTH=3", "sY|" + sY + "|Start Location (Y)|TEXT|WIDTH=3" )] [H: abort( cancel ) ] [H: tStartMap = json.set( json.set( json.set( gStartMap, "name", sMap ), "x", sX ), "y", sY ) ] [H: setLibProperty( "StartMap", tStartMap ) ]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: setStartMap

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [H: assert( isGM(), "" + getMacroName() + " is a GM only macro.", 0 )] [H: gmMap = getCurrentMapName()] [H: gmX = getTokenX(0)] [H: gmY = getTokenY(0)] [H: inString = "pa%{roll.count}|1|%{playerName}|CHECK|" ] [H: inputList = "" ] [H: apn = getAllPlayerNames() ] [H: numpn = listCount( apn ) ] [H, FOREACH( playerName, apn ), CODE: { [ inputList = listAppend( inputList, strformat( inString ), "##" ) ] }] [H: cancel = input( "tip |Select Recipients|| LABEL | SPAN=TRUE", + inputList + "" )] [H: abort( cancel ) ] [H: recipients = "[]" ] [H, FOR(i,0,numpn): recipients = if( eval( "pa" + i ), json.append( recipients, listGet( apn, i ) ), recipients) ] [H: output = "Token Move: Select your token(s) then click " + macroLink("this link","teleportPad@this", "gm-self", json.set( json.set ( json.set( "{}", "map", gmMap ), "X", gmX ), "Y", gmY )) + " to move near " + gmX + "," + gmY + " on map " + gmMap ] [R, W( recipients ): output ]
